subject: App crashes on photo capture - Galaxy S21
description: When I try to take a photo during an inspection, the app crashes back to the home screen. Started happening after the latest update. Galaxy S21, Android 15.

aiAnalysis.diagnosis: Camera permission regression in v2.4.1. The new photo capture module does not re-request CAMERA permission after app update on Android 14+. The permission grant survives the update but the runtime check fails because the new module uses a different permission check path.
aiAnalysis.proposedFix: In CameraModule.kt, replace the deprecated checkSelfPermission call with the new ActivityResultContracts.RequestPermission API. This is a 3-line fix in the capture() method. Patch already tested on emulator.
relatedIssues: Camera permission issue on Pixel 7 (resolved Oct 2025)

subject: Invoice PDF not generating for amended reports
description: When I amend a completed inspection report and try to generate a new invoice PDF, it just spins forever. The original PDF works fine.

subject: Login loop after Android 15 update
description: Since updating to Android 15, the app asks me to log in, I enter credentials, it accepts them, then immediately asks me to log in again. Endless loop.
resolution: Root cause: Android 15 changed session token handling. Fixed in v2.4.2 hotfix pushed to Play Store.
